English: Grr... Grr...
German: Grr ... Grr ...

English: Looks like he's stopped moving.
Chinese: 總、總算是封住了他的行動。
Korean: 어, 어떻게든 움직임은 막았다
German: Er bewegt sich nicht mehr.

English: Okay, now's our chance.
Chinese: 好……趁現在……
Korean: 좋아……지금이라면……
German: Dies ist unsere Chance!

English: Change back to your old self!
Chinese: 吶……變回原本的你吧！
Korean: 야……원래의 너로 돌아와줘!
German: Verwandel dich wieder in dein altes Ich!

English: We can live together again, just like we used to!
Chinese:
我們再……一起生活吧？
像那個時候一樣！
Korean:
다시……같이 살자!
그 때처럼 말이야!
German:
Dann können wir wieder zusammen wohnen, wie
früher!

English: Grrrrr...
Chinese: 咕……咕嚕嚕……
Korean: 그……그르르……
German: Grrr ...

English:
It's not working. He's just going to start running
amok again!
Chinese:
不、不行……再這樣下去，
他又要開始大鬧了……！
Korean:
아, 안 돼……이대로 가면
또 날뛸 거야……!
German:
Es funktioniert nicht. Er wird nur wieder Amok
laufen!

English: What can we do?!
Chinese: 到底該怎麼做……！
Korean: 대체 어떻게 해야……!
German: Was können wir tun?!

English:
Tell him this isn't the way to true strength.
Suggest reverting him to a DigiEgg.
Chinese:
說服他報復心態並非真正的強大
提議讓他先回到數碼蛋，再重新轉換
Korean:
복수심은 진정한 강함이 아니라고 타이른다
한번 디지타마로 되돌린 후 다시 컨버트하자고 제안한다
German:
Ihm sagen, dass man so nicht wirklich stark wird.
Vorschlagen, ihn in ein Digi-Ei zurückzuverwandeln.

English: True...strength...
Chinese: 真正的……強大……
Korean: 진정한……강함……
German: Wirklich ... stark ...

English:
That's right! I understand your thirst for
revenge, but you can't let it consume you!
Chinese:
沒錯！
就算要復仇！　只有報復心態是不行的！
Korean:
그래!
원수를 갚는다고 해도! 복수심만으로는 안 돼!
German:
Genau! Ich verstehe, dass du dich rächen willst,
aber du darfst dich davon nicht einnehmen lassen!

English: Doing this won't bring our friends back!
Chinese:
如果你變成了這樣，
他們也死不瞑目！
Korean:
네가 이래서야
녀석들도 좋아하지 않을 거야!
German: Davon werden unsere Freunde nicht wieder lebendig!

English:
Hang on! We can't let him carry on like this, but
isn't that a bit drastic?!
Chinese:
等、等一等！
確、確實無法這樣置之不理！
Korean:
기, 기다려줘!
화, 확실히 이대로 내버려 둘 수는 없어!
German:
Moment mal! Wir können nicht zulassen, dass er so
weitermacht, aber das ist schon ziemlich
drastisch!

English: I'll try to persuade him first! Hold off for now!
Chinese:
我會說服他給你們看的！
請再等一下！
Korean:
제대로 설득할 테니까!
조금만 더 기다려줘!
German:
Ich versuche erst, ihn zu überreden! Warte erst
mal noch!

English:
Did you hear that? You wouldn't want that, would
you?
Chinese:
你聽到了吧？
你也不想要這樣吧？
Korean:
들었지?
너도 그런 건 싫지?
German:
Hast du das gehört? Das würdest du nicht wollen,
oder?

English:
But if you don't stop all this, you leave us no
choice. I don't want that either!
Chinese:
但再這樣下去，我們別無選擇……
我不想要這樣！
Korean:
하지만 이대로 있으면 그럴 수밖에 없어……
난 그런 거 싫다!
German:
Aber wenn du damit nicht aufhörst, lässt du uns
keine andere Wahl. Ich will das auch nicht!

English:
Remember who you were as WarGrowlmon! Go back to
your old self!
Chinese:
所以你快想起身為大古拉獸時的回憶！
快變回原本的你！
Korean:
그러니까, 메가로그라우몬이었던 시절을 떠올려줘!
원래의 너로 돌아와 줘!
German:
Erinnere dich daran, wer du als WarGrowlmon
warst! Verwandel dich in dein früheres Ich!

English:
I understand you wanting to get stronger, but
you're not yourself anymore!
Chinese:
我懂你想要變強的心情！
但是現在的你是不行的！
Korean:
네가 강해지고 싶은 마음은 알아!
하지만 지금의 너로는 안 돼!
German:
Ich verstehe, dass du stärker werden willst,
aber das bist nicht mehr du!

English: Our friends wouldn't want you to be like this!
Chinese: 他們並不希望你變成現在的模樣！
Korean: 지금의 네 모습을, 녀석들은 원하지 않아!
German:
Unsere Freunde würden nicht wollen, dass du so
bist!

English: Grr...
Chinese: 咕嚕嚕…………
Korean: 그르릉…………
German: Grr ...

English:
Any strength that comes from the thirst for
revenge can only be negative!
Chinese: 從報復心態衍生出來的，即使再強也只是負面力量！
Korean: 복수심에서 태어나는 건, 아무리 강해도 부정적인 힘이야!
German:
Stärke, die durch Rachedurst entsteht,
kann nur negativ sein!

English: What you have now is not true strength!
Chinese: 這種東西！　不是我們追求的真正強大力量！
Korean: 그런 거! 우리가 바란 진정한 강함이 아니야!
German:
So wie du jetzt bist, bist du nicht wirklich
stark!

English: True...strength...
Chinese: 真正的……強大……
Korean: 진정한……강함……
German: Wirklich ... stark ...

English:
Our friends... Maybe they wouldn't want me to be
like this...
Chinese:
對……沒錯……
他們或許也……不期望現在的我……
Korean:
아아……그렇지……
녀석들도……지금의 내 모습을 바라지 않을지도……
German:
Unsere Freunde ... Vielleicht würden sie nicht
wollen, dass ich so bin.

English: Megidramon!
Chinese: 破滅魔龍獸……！
Korean: 메기드라몬……!
German: Megidramon!

English: No, they wouldn't want this.
Chinese:
啊啊……沒錯……
他們並不期望這種事情。
Korean:
아아……그래……녀석들은
이런 거 바라지 않아
German: Nein, das würden sie nicht wollen.

English: They weren't like that.
Chinese: 他們不是會期望發生這種事的人……
Korean: 바랄 녀석들이 아니야……
German: Sie waren nicht so.

English: Yeah, that's right!
Chinese:
對，沒錯。
就是這樣……！
Korean:
아아, 그래.
맞아……!
German: Ja, genau!

English:
Leomon... It looks like I've really caused a lot
of trouble.
Chinese:
獅子獸……
看樣子我給你添麻煩了。
Korean:
레오몬……아무래도
폐를 끼쳤던 것 같구나
German:
Leomon ...
Ich habe offenbar viele Probleme gemacht.

English:
Yeah, you idiot! Don't do anything like that ever
again!
Chinese:
真的。你這個混蛋……！
我可不想再碰到這種事了！
Korean:
정말 그래 바보 자식……!
이젠 이런 일은 사양이라고!
German: Ja, du Dummerchen! Mach so etwas nie wieder!

English:
Thirst for revenge only gives rise to negative
strength. Our friends wouldn't want that.
Chinese:
報復心態只會衍生出負面能量。
他們一定不期望這種事情發生。
Korean:
복수심은 부정적인 힘밖에 낳지 않아.
그런 걸 그 녀석들은 바라지 않아
German:
Rachedurst führt nur zu negativer Stärke. Das
würden unsere Freunde nicht wollen.

English:
I won't let my desire for revenge consume me.
That's not the type of strength I want.
Chinese:
我不會再被報復心態吞噬了……
我渴望的並不是負面力量。
Korean:
나는 이제 복수심에 삼켜지지 않겠다……
내가 바라는 힘은 부정적인 힘이 아니야
German:
Ich werde mich nicht von meinem Rachedurst
mitreißen lassen. Das ist nicht die Art von
Stärke, die ich will.

English:
Exactly! Now we can finally get back to our old
life.
Chinese:
對……沒錯！
終於……這樣就能回到原本的生活了。
Korean:
그래……맞아!
드디어……이제 원래 생활로 돌아갈 수 있어
German:
Genau! Jetzt können wir endlich unser altes
Leben weiterführen.

English:
As long as we're alive, we can start over, as many
times as necessary. Let's stick together and start
again!
Chinese:
只要還活著，無論幾次都能重來。
我們兩人再同心協力重新來過吧。
Korean:
목숨이 있는 한, 몇 번이고 다시 할 수 있어.
또 둘이서 힘을 합쳐서 다시 하자!
German:
Solange wir am Leben sind, können wir neu
anfangen, sooft es nötig ist. Halten wir
zusammen und fangen wir neu an!

English: Start again?
Chinese: 重新來過……？
Korean: 다시 해……?
German: Neu anfangen?

English:
As long as we're together, I'm sure we'll be able
to achieve true strength!
Chinese:
和現在的你一起的話，
一定可以獲得真正的強大力量！
Korean:
지금의 너와 함께라면 진정한 강함이란 걸
분명 손에 넣을 수 있을 거야!
German:
Solange wir zusammen sind, bin ich mir sicher,
dass wir wirklich stark werden können!

English: You're right. Let's get strong together!
Chinese: 是啊……我們倆一起變強吧！
Korean: 그렇지……둘이서 강해지자!
German: Du hast recht. Gemeinsam werden wir stark!

English: Yeah!
Chinese: 好！
Korean: 응!
German: Jawohl!

English: Sorry to keep you waiting. Thanks for your help!
Chinese:
……抱歉，讓你久等了。
這次真的幫了大忙！
Korean:
……아차 미안, 기다리게 했군.
이번 일은 정말 덕분에 살았다!
German:
Tut mir leid, dass du warten musstest. Danke für
deine Hilfe!

English: Words can't express how grateful I am!
Chinese: 不管怎麼道謝都不夠！
Korean: 아무리 감사 인사를 해도 모자라!
German: Ich kann gar nicht sagen, wie dankbar ich dir bin!

English:
So please call me any time you need my help! I'll
be right there!
Chinese:
所以，當需要我的力量時儘管對我說！
我會馬上衝去幫你的！
Korean:
그러니까, 내 힘이 필요하면 언제든지 불러줘!
금방 날아갈 테니까!
German:
Bitte ruf mich jederzeit, wenn du meine
Hilfe brauchst! Ich werde sofort kommen!

English: Until next time!
Chinese: 那麼再會了！
Korean: 그럼 또 보자!
German: Bis zum nächsten Mal!
